data.title: QAD | Manufacturing & Supply Chain Solutions in the Cloud
data.description: QAD is a provider of next-generation manufacturing and supply chain solutions in the cloud, enabling Adaptive Enterprises around the world.

![Image 2](https://www.qad.com/documents/Banners/Homepage/ftz-tariffs-webinar.jpg)

Think tariffs are unavoidable?  
Think again.
---------------------------------------------

Scott Taylor of Sandler, Travis & Rosenberg, P.A. breaks down the power of foreign-trade zones to slash tariffs, customs duties and import fees. Get the on-demand webinar.

[Watch Replay](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4825072/87A372519A533C4630C97B4676378FB7)

![Image 3](https://www.qad.com/documents/Banners/Homepage/2024-customer-awards.webp)

Celebrating the 2024 Customer Award winners
-------------------------------------------

Join us in recognizing visionary customers in the QAD community who are uniting their people, processes and systems to innovate, optimize and succeed in a changing world.

[Learn More](https://www.qad.com/about/news/-/room/read/2024/qad-announces-2024-customer-award-winners-at-transform-events)

![Image 4](https://www.qad.com/documents/images/framework/home-page/people-process-systems.webp)

Optimize your people, processes and systems
-------------------------------------------

If your technology is not supporting your processes then it is not serving your people. The QAD Industrial Transformation Platform addresses critical business challenges by emphasizing the importance of aligning your people, processes and systems.

[Learn More](https://www.qad.com/industrial-transformation-platform)

![Image 5](https://www.qad.com/documents/images/framework/home-page/qad-homepage-header-phenix.webp)

QAD acquires Phenix Software Inc.
---------------------------------

This latest acquisition broadens the QAD Digital Supply Chain Planning (DSCP) portfolio with the addition of an innovative advanced scheduling solution, helping manufacturers to improve productivity and accelerate factory performance.

[Learn More](https://www.qad.com/solutions/qad-advanced-scheduling)

### Our Vision

We build and empower Adaptive Enterprises. Our Industrial Transformation Platform helps to move businesses from where they are today to where they need to be - by aligning and optimizing people, processes and systems.

[About QAD](https://www.qad.com/about) [The Adaptive Enterprise![Image 10](https://www.qad.com/documents/images/framework/industrial-transformation-platform/itp-icon-arrow-cta.svg)](https://www.qad.com/adaptive-enterprise)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
